summary: AN ORDINANCE establishing, modifying and abrogating certain positions in the Executive, Health, Police, Fire, Law, Water, Park, Building, Lighting and engineering Departments and in the Offices of the City Comptroller and the Municipal Court; fixing compensation, superseding Ordinance 93500 insofar as in conflict; providing funds by budget item transfers, appropriations and reimbursable appropriations from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
